lyrics_abstract:
Boys and girls, wanna hear a true story?
Saturday night was at this real wild party
They had the liquor overflowing the cup
About five, six strippers trying to work for a buck

And I took one girl outside with me
Her name was Lila, she went to junior high with me
I said: "Why you up in there dancing for cash?
I guess a whole lot has changed since I've seen you last", she said

(What would you do if your son was at home
Crying[...]
